<a:chart width="500" height="400" >
                <a:axis mode="2D" lockyzoom="1" x1="-1" y1="-1" x2="10000" y2="4">
                    <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                        label{color:black} 
                        plane{
                            fill   : white;
                            stroke : #ebebeb
                        }
                        tiles{
                            fill   : white;
                            stroke : #ebebeb;
                        }
                        tick{
                            stroke : #ebebeb;
                            fill   : null;
                        }
                    </a:style>
                  <a:graph 
                    smartbinding = "sbZoomChart2" 
                    model        = "mdlZoomChart2" 
                    dataslice    = "1XM"
                    mipstep      = "2" 
                    mipset       = "avg" 
                    mipthres     = "100" 
                    mipmin       = "1"
                    mode         = "line">
                      <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                          graph {
                            stroke      : #0aa1e9;
                            weight      : 2;
                            fill        : #25a8e7;
                            opacity     : 1;
                            fillopacity : 0.7;
                            scale       : _div*0.5,1;
                            offset      : 0,0;
                          }
                      </a:style>
                  </a:graph>
                  </a:axis>
            </a:chart>
            <a:model id="mdlZoomChart2">
                <data><series>1</series></data>
            </a:model>    
            <a:smartbinding id="sbZoomChart2">
                <a:bindings>
                    <a:series 
                      formula   = "abs(1.5*(t+=random()*0.1-0.05)+0.5*sin(v*0.1))" 
                      length    = "10000" 
                      match     = "[series/text()]" 
                      delimiter = " " 
                      split     = "," 
                      css       = "#" />
                </a:bindings>
            </a:smartbinding>

<a:chart width="500" height="400">
                <a:axis 
                  mode      = "2D" 
                  lockyzoom = "1" 
                  x1        = "-1" 
                  y1        = "-1" 
                  x2        = "10000" 
                  y2        = "4">
                    <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                        label {color:#f7bd85} 
                        plane {
                            fill   : white;
                            stroke : #dcdcdc
                        };
                        tiles {fill:white;stroke:#dcdcdc;};
                        tick  {stroke:#f7bd85;fill:null;}
                        axis  {stroke:#f7bd85;side1:1;side2:1;}
                    </a:style>
                    <a:graph 
                      smartbinding = "sbZoomChart3" 
                      model        = "mdlZoomChart3" 
                      dataslice    = "1XM"
                      mipstep      = "2" 
                      mipset       = "avg" 
                      mipthres     = "100" 
                      mipmin       = "1"
                      mode         = "line">
                      <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                          graph {
                              stroke      : #89c451;
                              weight      : 2;
                              fill        : null;
                              opacity     : 1;
                              fillopacity : 0.7;
                              scale       : _div*0.5,1;
                              offset      : 0,0;
                          }
                      </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                </a:axis>
            </a:chart>
            <a:model id="mdlZoomChart3">
                <data><series>1</series></data>
            </a:model>    
            <a:smartbinding id="sbZoomChart3">
                <a:bindings>
                    <a:series 
                      formula   = "abs(1.5*(t+=random()*0.1-0.05)+0.5*sin(v*0.1))" 
                      length    = "10000" 
                      match     = "[series/text()]" 
                      delimiter = " " 
                      split     = "," 
                      css       = "#" />
                </a:bindings>
            </a:smartbinding>

</a:graph> </a:axis> </a:chart> <a:model id="mdlZoomChart4"> <data><series>1</series></data> </a:model> <a:smartbinding id="sbZoomChart4"> <a:bindings> <a:series formula = "abs(1.5*(t+=random()*0.1-0.05)+0.5*random()+0.5*sin(v*0.1))" length = "10000" match = "[series/text()]" delimiter = " " split = "," css = "#" /> </a:bindings> </a:smartbinding>

<a:chart width="500" height="400" anim="10">
                <a:axis 
                  mode  = "2D"
                  x1    = "-10" 
                  y1    = "-10" 
                  x2    = "10" 
                  y2    = "10">
                    <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                        plane  {fill:white;stroke:#ebebeb};
                        tiles  {fill:#eeeeee;stroke:#ebebeb;};
                        margin {left:0;top:0;right:0;bottom:0}
                        layout {onaxisx:1;onaxisy:1;}
                    </a:style>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "line" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      formula   = "x*x/10">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                          graph {
                            fill        : #00aeef;
                            weight      : 1;
                            fillopacity : 0.5;
                            fillout     : 0.9;
                          }
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "line" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      formula   = "-1*x*x/10">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                          graph {
                            fill        : #8dc63f;
                            weight      : 1;
                            fillopacity : 0.5;
                            fillout     : 0.9;
                          }
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                 </a:axis>
            </a:chart>

<a:chart width="500" height="400" anim="10">
                <a:axis 
                  mode  = "2D"
                  x1    = "-2" 
                  y1    = "-3" 
                  x2    = "6" 
                  y2    = "3">
                    <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                        plane  {fill:white;stroke:gray};
                        tiles  {fill:#eeeeee;stroke:gray;};
                        margin {left:0;top:0;right:0;bottom:0}
                        layout {onaxisx:1;onaxisy:1;}
                    </a:style>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "line" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      formula   = "sin(x*(1+a)+(1+a)*cos(x-2*n)*(1+a)+n)*cos(2*x+n)*2">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                          graph {
                            fill        : blue;
                            weight      : 2;
                            fillopacity : 0.5;
                            fillout     : 1;
                          }
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "line" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      formula   = "sin(2*x*(1+a)-cos(x+n)*(1+3*a)-2*n)*cos(x+n)">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                          graph {
                            fill        : red;
                            weight      : 2;
                            fillopacity : 0.5;
                            fillout     : 1;
                          }
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                </a:axis>
            </a:chart>
